description: A composite with the `layout` property initialized with a `Row`. All children are automatically arranged in one horizontal row, starting from the left.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object as widget properties.

layout.description: The row layout manager responsible for interpreting the [`layoutData`](./Widget.md#layoutdata) of the child widgets of this Composite.

spacing.description: The space between the children in device independent pixel.

alignment.description: Determines the vertical placement of the children. For the `stretchY` value to work correctly the `Row` needs to be given a height either by setting `height` or by setting `top` and `bottom`.
